forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. West wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, a sprawling blue sky graces the afternoon, presenting a lovely scene unmarred by fog or clouds. The temperature dances around a comfortable 70 degrees, providing a warm embrace as daylight surrenders softly into evening. A gentle westerly breeze, playful yet steady, whisks through the streets, rustling leaves and inviting smiles. As you transition from daylight to twilight, the air cools a notch, settling around 51 degrees, making it wise to layer a light jacket over your attire as you step out.

The clarity of the day is refreshing, urging you to take a leisurely stroll through the nearby parks or perhaps visit a local café to sip on something warm while watching the city light up as dusk falls. Urgent activities may seem misplaced today; instead, embrace the opportunity to engage in quiet conversation with friends or dive into a good book at an outdoor table. The serene conditions encourage such simple pleasures; you may even want to bring your camera to capture the enchanting twilight as it drapes the skyline in soft hues.
